alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 4:31AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile .Continued segmented lines of heavy showers / thunderstorms will allow for additional rainfall over this area through through at least Thursday morning with only brief lulls in precipitation. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1245 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique near Basile. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor agricultural flood damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Bayou Nezpique Basile 22.0 2.7 Wed 4 am CST 16.2 20.7 22.0 &&
